name: rawter
author: Paul Gordon
description: A router designed for use with RawJS apps

scripts.bundle: tsc -p tsconfig.release.json && terser ./+build/rawter.js > ./+build/rawter.min.js && npm run esm
scripts.release: npm run bundle && cd ./+build && cp ../package.json ./package.json && np && cp ./package.json ../package.json
